protein.general_function: Involved in protein serine/threonine kinase activity
protein.specific_function: Negative regulator of MAP3K1/2 signaling. Converts MAP3K2 from its phosphorylated form to its nonphosphorylated form and inhibits autophosphorylation of MAP3K2

reference.reference_text: Millward T, Cron P, Hemmings BA: Molecular cloning and characterization of a conserved nuclear serine(threonine) protein kinase. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1995 May 23;92(11):5022-6.
